summary: Most requested functional changes appear implemented: backend addMedia now accepts optional captions and stores empty string when null; frontend upload pipeline no longer requires captions; video “edits” preserve the original file to avoid JPEG conversion and audio stripping; and new in-feed play/pause + mute/unmute overlay controls were added with video lifecycle handling to reduce playback issues. The only requirement not verifiable/implementable from code diff is the build/deploy rerun.

missing_requirements.requirement: Re-run the full build and deployment so the updated frontend and backend are compiled and the deployed app reflects the fixes.
missing_requirements.reason: Build/deployment execution and production rollout are not represented in the provided code diff summary; no CI/CD config or deployment artifacts/logs are included to confirm this acceptance criterion.
evidence: <file-diff>: No build/deploy scripts, pipeline changes, or deployment artifacts shown
